popular.description: Games that everyone is talking about...

game.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
game.short_description: As a young boy, Link is tricked by Ganondorf, the King of the Gerudo Thieves.
game.full_description: Join Link on an epic quest to save Hyrule from the evil Ganondorf.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: SoulCalibur
game.short_description: This is a tale of souls and swords, transcending the world and all its history, told for all eternity...
game.full_description: The greatest weapons-based fighter returns, this time on Sega Dreamcast. Soul Calibur unleashes incredible graphics, fantastic fighters, and combos so amazing they'll make your head spin!
game.author: Project Soul

game.title: Grand Theft Auto IV
game.short_description: [Metacritic's 2008 Xbox 360 Game of the Year; Also known as "GTA IV"]
game.full_description: Experience the story of Niko Bellic as he navigates the criminal underworld of Liberty City.
game.author: Rockstar North

game.title: Super Mario Galaxy
game.short_description: 2007 Wii Game of the Year. The ultimate Nintendo hero is taking the ultimate step ... out into space.
game.full_description: Join Mario as he explores the galaxy to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: Super Mario Galaxy 2
game.short_description: Super Mario Galaxy 2, the sequel to the galaxy-hopping original game, includes the gravity-defying, physics-based exploration from the first game, but is loaded with entirely new galaxies and features to challenge players.
game.full_description: Continue the space-faring adventure with Mario in all-new galaxies and challenges.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
game.short_description: Ignore everything you know about The Legend of Zelda games.
game.full_description: Embark on a breathtaking open-world adventure as Link and discover the secrets of Hyrule.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3
game.short_description: Challenge up to four friends in online competitions over a LAN or the Internet. Take them on in both Trick Attack and Graffiti modes.
game.full_description: Experience the thrill of skateboarding with Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3, featuring online multiplayer and iconic skate spots.
game.author: Neversoft

game.title: Perfect Dark (2000)
game.short_description: Step into the Dark... As Carrington Institute's most promising new Agent, Joanna Dark must uncover the truth behind the dataDyne Corporation's recent technological breakthroughs - breakthroughs which could have serious consequences for mankind.
game.full_description: Join Joanna Dark in a thrilling first-person shooter as she uncovers a conspiracy that could threaten the world.
game.author: Rare

game.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
game.short_description: Developed by the creators of Grand Theft Auto V and Red Dead Redemption, Red Dead Redemption 2 is an epic tale of life in Americaâ€™s unforgiving heartland.
game.full_description: Experience an epic tale of life in America's unforgiving heartland in Red Dead Redemption 2.
game.author: Rockstar Games

game.title: Grand Theft Auto V
game.short_description: The sprawling sun-soaked metropolis of Los Santos is chock full of self-help coaches, starlets and C-List celebrities, once on top of the media world, now struggling to stay relevant in time of economic malaise and lowest-common-denominator reality TV.
game.full_description: Explore the sun-soaked metropolis of Los Santos in the critically acclaimed open-world game Grand Theft Auto V.
game.author: Rockstar North

game.title: Metroid Prime
game.short_description: Samus returns in a new mission to unravel the mystery behind the ruined walls scattered across Tallon IV.
game.full_description: Join Samus Aran in Metroid Prime as she explores the mysterious planet Tallon IV and uncovers its secrets.
game.author: Retro Studios

game.title: Grand Theft Auto III
game.short_description: Players are put at the heart of their very own gangster movie, and let loose in a fully-realised 3 dimensional city with a cast of hundreds, 50 plus vehicles, ranging from sports cars to ice cream trucks and from boats to buses, 3 hours of music, including opera, reggae, house, drum and bass, pop and disco, and a huge array of street ready weapons.
game.full_description: Experience the groundbreaking open-world gameplay of Grand Theft Auto III and explore Liberty City.
game.author: DMA Design

game.title: Super Mario Odyssey
game.short_description: New Evolution of Mario Sandbox-Style Gameplay. Mario embarks on a new journey through unknown worlds, running and jumping through huge 3D worlds in the first sandbox-style Mario game since Super Mario 64 and Super Mario Sunshine. Set sail between expansive worlds aboard an airship, and perform all-new actions, such as throwing Mario's cap.
game.full_description: Embark on a globe-trotting adventure with Mario in Super Mario Odyssey and discover new worlds and abilities.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: Halo: Combat Evolved
game.short_description: In a desperate attempt to keep a conquering alien race called the Covenant from finding Earth, you--a cybernetically enhanced soldier representing the peak of human military evolution--and a ragtag group of Marines flee to a distant uncharted system where you unexpectedly stumble across Halo, an enormous alien artifact in orbit between a gas giant and its moon. Your objective: Uncover Halo's horrible secret, and destroy mankind's nemesis - the Covenant.
game.full_description: Join the fight against the Covenant in Halo: Combat Evolved and uncover the mysteries of the Halo ring.
game.author: Bungie
